entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 110 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
